animal.name: Pistol Shrimp
animal.desc: The loudest animal in the world

animal.name: Flamingos
animal.desc: Flamingos are not pink. They are born grey, their diet of brine shrimp and blue green algae contains a natural pink dye called canthaxanthin that makes their feathers pink.

animal.name: Inland Taipan
animal.desc: the most venomous snake in the world. A single bite contains enough venom to kill at least 100 fully grown men, and can kill within just 30 minutes, if left untreated

animal.name: Mayfly
animal.desc: The shortest living animal in the world

animal.name: horned lizard
animal.desc: can shot blood from its eye
